The femme dogded as good as she could the missiles, but she was stuck 
by three or four. She plummet towards Vlad and in the last seconds 
she transformed to her Robot mode and showed a large and sharped 
sword while she fell, she cleary had the intention to slash him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> If he ever doubted that this woman was not a true warrior, the Khan 
> was now corrected. He had not even seen her follow him.
> 
> However, he knew he was superior. Hundreds of years of genetic 
> selection had made him a perfect warrior, and he knew he was able 
to 
> surpass a mere machine, as deadly as it was.
>

burned 
> some armor and paint over his torso. He chose to counter with full

She
